empty.title: No Roadmap Yet
empty.description: Generate an AI-powered roadmap that understands your project's target audience and creates a strategic feature plan.

competitorAnalysis.title: Competitor Analysis Options
competitorAnalysis.description: This project has an existing competitor analysis from
competitorAnalysis.useExistingDescription: Reuse the competitor insights you already have. Faster and no additional web searches.
competitorAnalysis.runNewDescription: Perform fresh web searches to get updated competitor information. Takes longer.
competitorAnalysis.skipDescription: Generate roadmap without any competitor insights.

generation.discoveringDescription: Discovering target audience and user needs...

competitorDialog.title: Enable Competitor Analysis?
competitorDialog.description: Enhance your roadmap with insights from competitor products
competitorDialog.identifiesCompetitors: Identifies 3-5 main competitors based on your project type
competitorDialog.searchesFeedback: Searches app stores, forums, and social media for user feedback and pain points
competitorDialog.suggestsFeatures: Suggests features that address gaps in competitor products
competitorDialog.webSearchesDescription: This feature will perform web searches to gather competitor information. Your project name and type will be used in search queries. No code or sensitive data is shared.
competitorDialog.optionalInfo: You can generate a roadmap without competitor analysis if you prefer. The roadmap will still be based on your project structure and best practices.

competitorViewer.title: Competitor Analysis Results
competitorViewer.description: Analyzed {count} competitors to identify market gaps and opportunities

featureCard.competitorInsight: This feature addresses competitor pain points

deleteDialog.title: Delete Feature?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently remove "{{title}}" from your roadmap.
